SBG-Cli

Works on Linux and OS X.

Requirements Linux:
Docker==1.0.* (need to support api version 1.17)

Install:
- install docker and add your user to docker group
- pip install sbg-cli

Requirements OS X:
boot2docker==1.0.*

Install:
- install boot2docker
- boot2docker start
- pip install sbg-cli

Running:
- make sure that boot2docker is running before using sbg-cli (boot2docker start)
